description:
The little sheep`s plan to explore the sky is interrupted by Wolffy. During the fight, Wolffy is shaken away by a mysterious power, and the mysterious power is accidentally integrated into all the sheep. Alone, Weslie reorganises the Hip Hop to look for his buddies.
On the way, Weslie not only breaks into the weather factory that produces weather and the rainbow world that colours the sky, but also discovers that the magical power in his body can inspire the Hip Hop to perform cool skills and help him repel Wolffy. In the end, Weslie gets his pals back and completes the sky adventure together.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之奇幻天空岛

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Qihuan Tiankong Dao
喜羊羊与灰太狼之奇幻天空岛
